result.execSummary:
The defendant Trystan L Jones was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of THC (2nd+ Offense) AMENDED FROM Possess w/Intent-THC (<=200 grams) [Modifiers: Second and Subsequent Offense], a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
**AMENDED 5-30-2017 to reflect correct charge.**
Length of confinement and length of extended supervision for a total of 3 years bifurcated sentence.

superMiscConds.notes: No use or possession of alcohol or controlled substances, except for those prescribed by treating health care provider.  Submit to random testing as required by agent.  Cooperate with AODA assessment and follow through with treatment, counseling and program recommendations.

Provide DNA sample if not previously provided.  Pay costs of supervision, court obligations and DNA surcharge.  Comply with all rules and regulations of supervising agent.  Cooperate with counseling, treatment and programs determined appropriate.  Follow through with recommendations.  Firearm prohibition warning given.  Voting prohibited until sentence has been completed and civil rights are restored.

Court Reporter Mark Garvin.  Waiver of Preliminary hearing filed.  Probable cause found;  bound over.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for October 30, 2015 at 08:15 am.
Douglas Henderson
Preliminary hearing at 10-07-2015 09:00 am

Charges per attached criminal complaint. Conditions:  It is a condition of this bond that the defendant NOT consume or possess any controlled substances.  This is to be monitored by random UA's and/or breathalyzers.  The defendant is to report directly to Zimmerman Consulting Inc. (ZCI) for monitoring - report to 524 Main Street, Suite 302, Racine, WI  53403 (third floor of the Monument Square Building) or call (262)632-1780 to immediately schedule an appointment.   The defendant is further ordered to report for testing after each court appearance.  Make all court appearances on time.  Failure to appear will result in the issuance of a warrant for your arrest, possible bail jumping charges and forfeiture of any bond on deposit.

Defendant Trystan L Jones in court with attorney Adrienne Michelle Moore.  Defendant Trystan L Jones in custody.  Bridget D. Brave appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Defense motions to dimiss CT 1 based upon lack of probable cause. 
BTC: Motion to dismiss is denied. Reading of complaint is waived, probable cause found, bond set.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for October 7, 2015 at 09:00 am.
